title: A pitch is thrown
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing the pitchcast strikezone AND a pitch is thrown
custom_expected:
THEN A dot is displayed in the vicinity of the strikezone grid in the position that the pitch crossed the plane
1. Dots will be color coded (see later steps)
Dot behavior:
1. each pitch is numbered inside of the dot
2. active pitch is bright and has a halo
3. previous pitch is bright but does not have a halo
4. the color of each pitch previous to that will get less bright
5. pitches should remain on the at-bat player's card and not transfer when switching cards

1. the dot is red and includes pitch number
2. details on the pitch are displayed
3. the number on the right on the plate icon is increased

title: Ball
